channel.title: WesT-LocaL's Ultimate Autotalker
channel.description:
[b]WesT-LocaL's Ultimate Autotalker[/b]
Hey, this is av4 but im using the tag WesT-LocaL for my scripts. Ive created an older autotalker and decided it was time to upgrade and learn to use forms and some srl procedures.
[b]Features:[/b] - Form: For an easy setup, its all very simple. - Antiban Choice: You can choose to use the spamming and detectable fast talk or the more human like procedures with mistakes etc. - Uses the F1-F4 keys
Any feedback is welcome
Id like to thank Ejjman and starblaster for ideas i used (but edited myself).
